HappyShop is a Mobile Location Based In-Store start-up, aiming to resolve inefficiency in the last mile digital marketing space (Digital in the Real world) and to prepare brands for the new consumer behavior. (Smartconsumer)

Founded in early 2011 and developed by accomplished Digital Marketing, Retail, BI and CPG executives, with over 25 combined years experience.

HappyShop provides a technology platform to merchants/Retail businesses and CPG looking to connect to consumers with Social, Mobile and location-targeted content.

Happyshop mission is to connect brands & retailers loyal shoppers with the products and promotions they sell, based on the specific interests, location, and preferences of their customers, in real-time. Our team is creating an environment that enables communication to increase the impact of advertising. (Giving RELEVANCE)

We help brands to make SmartMarketing to adapt to the New Consumer.
